00068 #define RTC_INIT_DEFAULT                                     \
00069 {                                                            \
00070   true,    /* Start counting when init done */               \
00071   false,   /* Disable updating during debug halt */          \
00072   true     /* Restart counting from 0 when reaching COMP0 */ \
